dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5470 IH: VET MEDS Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ciscomani (for himself, Mr. Vasquez, Mr. Carl, and Ms. Perez) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To extend temporary authority regarding license portability for certain practitioners to be able to practice across State borders, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veteran Medical Exams for Distant Areas Act or the VET MEDS Act.

section.header: Modification to matters relating to Department of Veterans Affairs medical disability examinations
section.text: Section 2002(a)(4) of the Johnny Isakson and David P. Roe, M.D. Veterans Health Care and Benefits Improvement Act of 2020 (Public Law 116–315; 38 U.S.C. 5101 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking On the date that is three years after the date of the enactment of this Act and inserting On September 1, 2028; and
by striking on the day before the date of the enactment of this Act and insert on January 4, 2021.
